column4: Is there any way of checking the integrity of the disk without unmounting it - i need to keep this server up but i suspect the file_system may be going bad - i just need to diagnose - if its bad i'll be able to take it offline and treat it - but is there any way to tell without takign everything offline ?
Anyway to check a filesystem without going offline?  Maybe, don't know.  If you want to know physical drive health, use SMART tools.  apt-get install smartmontools
those are not GUI based are they? I don't want the overhead of installing X on the server
